What is Amazon Polly?
Amazon Polly is part of the artificial intelligence services provided by AWS.
The service supports Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) to adjust speaking style, and dictionaries (Lexicons) for costume pronunciation.
Amazon Polly is able to automatically interpret common text formats such as abbreviations, numerical sequences and homographs.
The generated speech by Amazon Polly could be exported as an MP3, OGG, post-code modulation, speech marks, etc.
Amazon Polly Pricing
Amazon Polly service has Pay-as-you-go model and is priced based on the number of processed characters of text.
